sentences.sContent: You can see the iridescence on their faces.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can see the iridescence on their faces.
sentences.sCn: 你可以看到他们脸上的彩虹色。

sentences.sContent: When sunlight or moonlight passes through a layer of thin clouds, the result can be iridescence.
sentences.sContent_eng: When sunlight or moonlight passes through a layer of thin clouds, the result can be iridescence.
sentences.sCn: 阳光或月光穿过薄薄的云层就会形成虹彩。

sentences.sContent: For day by day he felt more and more like a bubble filled with darkness, round which whirled the iridescence of his consciousness .
sentences.sContent_eng: For day by day he felt more and more like a bubble filled with darkness, round which whirled the iridescence of his consciousness .
sentences.sCn: 他日益感到自己象一个充满黑色的泡沫，四周缠绕着自身意识的彩虹。
